item.description: Overview Alucinara, also known as magic, is a form of energy that alters the ways in which the natural world can operate.

item.title: Alucinara Energy
item.description: Overview Alucinara, alucinara energy, or magic, is an immanent form of energy which was created at the beginning of the universe and alters the laws of nature in anomalous and supernatural ways.

item.title: Darkness
item.description: Overview Darkness, is an extraneous form of energy which was created shortly after the beginning of the universe and forms the foundation of consciousness and the soul, an integral part of living beings alongside alucinara and the physical body.

item.title: The Angels
item.description: Overview The angels are celestial beings created by the Judges to govern the elements of the cosmos. They are worshipped as parts of the pantheons of many Minikin cultures, and can be communicated with through dreams, visions, and prayer.

item.title: The Judges
item.description: Overview The Judges are the two celestial beings from the beginning of the cosmos who created the universe, the spirits of darkness, and the angels.

item.title: The Petrified Child
item.description: Overview The Petrified Child is a semi-corporeal deity which is worshipped by many minikin groups, including the Morellic minikin. The child’s duty is to destroy all evil according to its own moral code, protecting the cosmos1 from any living being who wishes to desecrate it.

item.title: The Spirits of Darkness
item.description: Overview The spirits of darkness are celestial beings that were created by the second Judge behind the first’s back out of jealousy for the first’s superiority.
